hooks.command:
echo 'Flowstate plugin loaded.

Workflow: /flowstate:brainstorm → /flowstate:plan → /flowstate:deepen-plan → /flowstate:work → /flowstate:review → /flowstate:compound

Commands:
  brainstorm    - Guided design session with structured dialogue
  plan          - Create TDD implementation plan with research agents
  deepen-plan   - Enhance plan with parallel research per section
  work          - Execute plan with TDD, worktrees, subagent dispatch
  review        - 5-agent parallel code review with prioritized findings
  deep-review   - Extended 14+ agent review with conditional reviewers
  compound      - Capture learnings to docs/solutions/ for future sessions
  debug         - 6-step systematic debugging with 3-strike escalation

Start with /flowstate:brainstorm for new features, or /flowstate:debug for bugs.'
